B1.body: This wonderful specimen legally has an age of about twelve years…
B1.speaker: Bellgates

T2.body: Sorry to interrupt you, let me save your and my time. Is this the only thing you were going to present to me?
T2.speaker: Minister Twilight

T4.body: This device only allows you to age foals and rejuvenate the elderly?
T4.speaker: Minister Twilight

B5.body: No, it doesn't rejuvenate, it slows down aging, I said that...
B5.speaker: Bellgates

P6.body: Wheeee, this purple unicorn is ma-a-ad…
P6.speaker: Wonderful specimen

T8.body: You've wasted my time, and now you're going to waste even more on some excuses? Forget it, I won't fund you and..
T8.speaker: Minister Twilight

T5.1.body: *sign* You left my ministry and now ask me funding this? Do you know how many similar inventions are put on my desk every day?
T5.1.speaker: Minister Twilight
